dao

Class Token

  • java.lang.Object
    • dao.Token

  • public class Token
extends java.lang.Object
    A token as defined in "An Introduction to Information Retrieval" (Manning et al. 2009) is a term + docID pair. Here we define terms to be Strings and docIDs to be integers.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Token(java.lang.String _term, Document _doc)
      Constructs a new Token Object and initializes the data values to the provided parameters.

      Debugging method.

        _docID - The document ID that this term occurs in.
